name: beat it (anthonyxie)
description:
Beat It is an movement shooter that concentrates heavily on staying on beat! The more accurate you are with your timing, the more powerful your projectiles. To dodge enemies, you're equipped with a dash that goes further and faster depending on your timing. Defeat all the enemies and overcome Evil Ge Wang and claim infinite glory! Build is for Windows 64-bit.

All of the timings, the shooting of both players and enemies, are strongly timed using ChucK, as is all the music you hear in the background!
